Title: How to Buy a Monetized YouTube Channel on accsmarket.com

Content.Knowledge Point: Sign up for an account and add money to your balance
Content.Text: To buy a monetized YouTube channel, first sign up for an account on accsmarket.com and add money to your balance to pay for the service fee.

Content.Knowledge Point: Search for channels based on filters
Content.Text: Search for channels based on filters such as niche, monetization status, and subscriber count to find the right channel for you.
Verify the authenticity of the channel by checking the about section, videos, and subscriber count to ensure it's a legitimate channel.

Content.Knowledge Point: Buy the channel through the platform
Content.Text: Buy the channel through the accsmarket.com platform by selecting your preferred payment method and attaching your email address to the channel.

The platform uses an escrow process to ensure the safety of the transaction. The seller assigns an escrow agent as the primary owner of the channel, and after seven days, the escrow agent verifies everything and transfers ownership to the buyer.
The speaker also offers additional services such as helping clients buy monetized YouTube channels, managing the channel, and creating videos for the channel.
